metadata.title: CVE-2022-0489 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting with 8.15 . It was possible to trigger a DOS by using the mathfeature with a specific formula in issue comments.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
